name: Dengeki PlayStation D84
synopsis: {{DengekiInfo}} This disc was issued with Dengeki PlayStation 326-th edition. The issue consists of two DVDs. The first is a video only DVD with [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Final_Fantasy_VII:_Advent_Children Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children] trailers (?) along with game guides, footage for some games, etc. The second is a PS2 DVD contains:
